This is the personal page of David Ryan. I am a researcher at

[Click here to view my CV (PDF)](David_Ryan.pdf)

[View my LinkedIn profile](http://au.linkedin.com/in/davidryanau)

## PhD Thesis

**Crowd monitoring using computer vision**  
David Ryan  
_Queensland University of Technology (QUT)_, 2014  
[[PDF (17MB)](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/65652/1/David_Ryan_Thesis.pdf)] [[QUT ePrints](http://eprints.qut.edu.au/65652/)]

**Summary:** Novel computer vision techniques have been developed for automatic monitoring of crowded environments such as airports, railway stations and shopping malls. Using video feeds from multiple cameras, the techniques enable crowd counting, crowd flow monitoring, queue monitoring and abnormal event detection. The outcome of the research is useful for surveillance applications and for obtaining operational metrics to improve business efficiency.
